events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The customer's request has been classified under Refund due to mention of refund and wrong product.
The case was assigned to support agent Emily J. who specializes in refund requests for incorrect orders.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the wrong product you received.
Could you please provide a photo of the incorrect item you received as well as your order number to proceed with the refund?
Here is the photo of the item I received along with my order number 987654321. I look forward to resolving this quickly.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and you will receive a confirmation email shortly.
Thank you for the prompt reply. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
Your refund has been successfully processed and deposited back to your original payment method. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and everything is satisfactory on your end.
Since your refund issue is resolved and no further questions have been raised, we are closing this support case. Thank you!
We have sent you a short survey to rate your support experience. Your feedback is important to us.
